unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? My grandfather, Kishan Lal from Haryana, swore by it back in '70s! He used desi cow dung, not those chemical Rs.500/bag fertilizers.Yield was lower, sure, but tastier. 10th May harvest festival always felt special. Remember amla achar made with it! Heard IIT Delhi is researching better organic methods now. Good move! Saw something on DD Kisan channel at 14:30 hrs yesterday about this. 26/01 is Republic Day after all, we need healthy citizens.
normalised: organic farming, eh? My grandfather, Kishan Lal from Haryana, swore by it back in seventies! He used desi cow dung, not those chemical rupee five hundred per bag fertilizers. Yield was lower, sure, but tastier. tenth May harvest festival always felt special. Remember amla achar made with it! Heard I I T Delhi is researching better organic methods now. Good move! Saw something on D D Kisan channel at two thirty P M yesterday about this. twenty sixth January is Republic Day after all, we need healthy citizens.
